element.name: EMS Agency Service Area County(ies)
element.definition: The county(ies) within each state for which the agency formally provides service.
element.v3Comment:
Each state listed is associated with the counties, census tracts, and ZIP codes within the EMS Agency Service Area for each state. County codes are based on ISO/ANSI codes. It is a 5-digit code based on state (2-digit) and county (3-digit).
GNIS Codes Website: http://geonames.usgs.gov/domestic/download_data.htm
